entry.title: main
entry.content:
About Me

I am currently a Ph.D. student in Peking University, Beijing, China. I am supervised by Prof. Shiliang Zhang. Before that, I received master’s degree in Technology and Engineering Center for Space Utilization, Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2020 and received bachelor’s degree in School of Electronic Information and Communications at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) in 2017. My research interests include computer vision, deep learning, with focus on unsupervised learning, object tracking, domain adaptation, domain generalization.

News

  • [2021. 03] One of my paper on unsupervised person ReID was accepted by CVPR.
  • [2020. 10] One of my paper on long-term object tracking was accepted by Pattern Recognition.
  • [2020. 09] I started pursuing Ph.D at Peking University.
  • [2020. 06] I started an internship in SenseTime.
  • [2020. 06] I graduated from Technology and Engineering Center for Space Utilization, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
  • [2019. 07] I achieved 5th place (Overall) and 2nd place (Long-term tracking) in Single Object Tracking, VisDrone Challenge, ICCVW.
  • [2019. 05] I achieved 1st place in test set of OxUvA long-term tracking dataset.
  • [2019. 04] One of my paper on object tracking in satellite video was accepted by TGRS.

Publications

  • Xuan S, Zhang S. Intra-Inter Camera Similarity for Unsupervised Person Re-Identification[J]. arXiv preprint arXiv:2103.11658, 2021. [Paper], [Code]
  • Xuan S, Li S, Zhao Z, et al. Siamese networks with distractor-reduction method for long-term visual object tracking[J]. Pattern Recognition, 2021, 112: 107698. [Paper]
  • Xuan S, Li S, Han M, et al. Object tracking in satellite videos by improved correlation filters with motion estimations[J]. IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing, 2019, 58(2): 1074-1086. [Paper], [Code]
  • Xuan S, Li S, Zhao Z, et al. Rotation adaptive correlation filter for moving object tracking in satellite videos[J]. Neurocomputing, 2021, 438: 94-106. [Paper]
entry.summary:
